channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Broken concrete bollards, 30th March
item.description:
The two concrete bollards adjacent to the fence have been hit and broken off at there base by delivery drivers. These have simply been stood back up on the base but I am concerned a child could climb on them and they could fall on them. They are quite heavy and are not secure.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Lyefield Road West, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 70 Welch Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Bin overflowing for 1 week at a time with dog poo, 28th March
item.description:
The bin here is over flowing on a regular basis for 1 week at a time it's full of dog poo bags and local takeaway boxes On the floor around this bin is dog poo bags some people see a bin and think they can throw them just nearby instead of finding another bin or taking it home with them This bin needs to be emptying daily As it's next to a bench and on a well used dog walking route and a local school It gets emptied 1 a week then it's overflowing by the next day
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Bodgers Mount Mill Lane, Brockworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Permanent puddle, 27th March
item.description:
No matter what the weather, there is almost always a muddy puddle outside 79 The Park. Maybe a blocked drain but it’s not obvious.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 79 The Park, Cheltenham

item.title: Offensive graffiti in alleyway between London Road and Upper Park Street, 27th March
item.description:
